divs: Sighting DetailsI witnessed numerous crafts up in the oil fields. They are probably interested in the natural gas plant that was being built west of williston. It was noticed at night while i was waiting for my truck to unload, i watched it twinkling multi-colors for about 5-7 minutes. THEN it was exactly like the trail of a starship on Star trek. It went away to the right side of the moon, and was out of site within 1-2 seconds. It left with an orange trail, but a millasecond later in the second i watched, it went black for about another millasecondthen it must have hit another gear as i watched it leave The line to the eye was not straight but kinda arched as it went away. I could not believe i had witnessed thre speed of light or faster? I had mentioned it to another driver, the same night he seen a shooting star just stop around the same area in the sky. I have more sitings that i do have witnesses for. About 4 more for sure!! These are not contrieved stories. Have have trained eyes for details and memories.
